content:
Scenario: Flexible scheduling enables caregiving and employment simultaneously
    Given James's caregiving demands vary unpredictably
    And rigid schedules would make employment impossible
    When James negotiates work arrangements
    Then the workplace_elohim should advocate for flexibility
    And scheduling should accommodate caregiving emergencies
    And James should be able to work around care demands
    And flexibility should be policy, not just employer goodwill
    And workplace should recognize caregivers need scheduling flexibility
